__e: Listen, I have to do something and it is very important, and I had no idea when I should have told!
But I owe nobody an explanation, for why I took back what was rightfully mine.
I come from the other side of the wall, I'm happy, I am free, I do not owe explanations to anyone, not to my parents, not to my country, not even to God.
I might have some explaining to do to the captain.
You see, Charles, the reason they think I'm a threat is I tell believers not to get this chip.
- She has no explanation for what she was doing there.
And tell him he better be prepared to explain why he's shutting down my prison group.
I know, but I owe it to my family to explain my behavior, and I owe it to Abby's family too.
I don't have to defend my lifestyle to you or anybody.
